item.title: CVE-2024-47341|2024-10-06T10:50:13.888Z -- lester%20%E2%80%98gamerz%E2%80%99%20chan -- wp-downloadmanager
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Lester ‘GaMerZ’ Chan WP-DownloadManager allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WP-DownloadManager: from n/a through 1.68.8.
